name: Music Make Me Shoot My Gun
name_original: Music Make Me Shoot My Gun
description:
Defend against evil critters with your music! A tower defense rhythm game made for Ludum Dare 41. 

CONTROLS:

--Mouse to place towers

--Arrow keys to hit the notes

The theme of the jam was "combine two incompatible genres." After having a rough start on Friday attempting to  think of an idea and then some personal-life stuff getting in the way, the game didn't truly start getting created until Saturday. We picked this combination of genres because I really wanted to make a rhythm game and he really wanted to make a tower-defense. I think we are both pretty happy with what came out in the end. This is our second game jam.
